meta.title: Business Application Form
meta.description: You can create an individual or corporate business profile on Turistikrota and rent or sell your products such as villas, hotels, tours, car rentals.
meta.keywords: vendor application form, vendor application, Turistikrota, Turistikrota vendor application

title: Business Application Form

type-select.title: Business Type
type-select.subtitle: Please select the type of vendor you are applying for.

info.title: Information
info.content: This selection is important for invoicing purposes. If you cannot issue an invoice with the Turkish Revenue Administration (you do not have a tax identification number registered in the Republic of Turkey), you can choose it individually. In this case, you must be a citizen of the Republic of Turkey.

corporation.title: Institution
corporation.subtitle: I am applying as an institution.

individual.title: Individual
individual.subtitle: I am applying as an individual.

general.realName: Real Name (will be shown on Business profile)

corporationTypes.limitedPartnershipShareCapital: Limited Company with Capital Divided into Shares

hashInfo: This data will be stored encrypted and will not be shared with third parties.
analyticsInfo: This data will be used for various analyses. This data will not be shared with third parties.
success: Your application has been sent successfully. We will contact you via email as soon as possible.
